item.title: NYC Prosecutors Use A Dubious Maneuver To Try To Lock Up Daniel Penny
item.description: With Penny's future on the line, a judge is willing to 'take a chance' on a legal maneuver that only benefits the prosecution.

item.title: Court Filings Call For End Of Leftist Wisconsin AG’s Witch Hunt Against 2020 Trump Electors
item.description: The filings argue Democrat Attorney General Josh Kaul's bogus 'fake electors' case tramples state law and the Constitution's Supremacy Clause.

item.title: Kristen Welker’s Question To Trump About Birthright Citizenship Completely Misses The Point
item.description: The propaganda press exploits the lack of legal clarity about the issue to malign Trump as willing to stomp on the Constitution.

item.title: Survey: Homeschool And Christian School Graduates Far More Likely To Keep Their Faith
item.description: Public education is erasing America's future by killing the Christian beliefs that inspire parenthood.

item.title: Ignore The Transgender Mob’s Attempts To Weaponize Your Kindness
item.description: It is time for us to push the absurd transgender activist agenda out of our schools, bathrooms, and sports and roll forward.
